content:
Hi ,
How would someone map EOB.Coverage.class:group for a Qualified Health Plan (QHP). QHP's are not a group as defined by the Coverage Class codes.
Code Display Definition
group Group An employee group

EOB.Coverage.class has a cardinality of 2...*

Appreciate the help.
Based on discussion yesterday with @Amol Vyas, there will be an update to change the EOB.Coverage.class:group cardinality to 0...1 and the EOB.Coverage.class cardinality to 1...*
